snippet: Sprint increases its offer for Clearwire and its valuable wireless spectrum to $2.97 a share from $2.90 and wins the support of its board.
abstract: Sprint increases its offer for Clearwire and its valuable wireless spectrum to $2.97 a share from $2.90 and wins the support of its board.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Sprint Nextel Reaches a Deal to Buy Rest of Clearwire
headline.print_headline: Sprint Nextel Reaches a Deal to Buy Rest of Clearwire
